name: OpendEgde Backend for Django through pyodbc
tagline: This module allows the use of the OpenEdge (Progress) databases through Django. It provides the ability to create tables from Django models, or to access existing tables (4GL or SQL) in your Django application.
body:
### Welcome to the Monasys GitHub Page

### Authors and Contributors

This module has been developed by Jean-Yves Priou (@monasysinfo).

### Support or Contact

Help and documentation can be found at http://help.github.com/pages.
You can contact monasysinfo@gmail.com for direct help.
